name: Mixed Bag 5 Online Trivia | Mixed 10 Q. Difficult [C] | 10 Questions

questions.text: The crew of the Enterprise on TV's original 'Star Trek' numbers how many?
questions.explanation:
430.

	'Star Trek' was on TV from 1966 to 1969 starring William Shatner and Leonard Nimoy among others.

questions.text: William Gargan played what detective on radio and TV?
questions.explanation:
Martin Kane.

	Martin Kane was also played by Lloyd Nolan, Lee Tracy and Mark Stevens.

questions.text: Which brand of cigarette sponsored radio's 'Your Hit Parade'?
questions.explanation:
Lucky Strike.

	It was on from 1950 to 1974 first on radio and then on television.

questions.text: How many years did it take to build Chicago's Sears (Willis) Tower?
questions.explanation:
3.

	In 1973 Sears opened its new headquarters there.

questions.text: In what state is Saranac Black and Tan beer produced?
questions.explanation:
New York.

	It is northeastern New York near Lake Placid.

questions.text: The Black Sea and the White Sea are both located on which continent?
questions.explanation:
Europe.

	The Black Sea is between southeastern Europe and Asia Minor while the White Sea is in Russia.

questions.text: Rich boy Rollo, in the comic strip 'Nancy', has what color hair?
Name the snack food that the Indians introduced to the colonists.
questions.explanation:
Popcorn.

	The first European explorers described the Indians as using it for food, hair decoration and scattering it for religious ceremonies.

questions.text: (True or False) Hitler planned to rebuild Berlin and call it Germania?
The gold supply of the United States is stored at Fort Knox. Where is the silver stored?
questions.explanation:
West Point.

	Most of the silver mined today is in conjunction with lead or copper mining with silver being a by-product.
